name: Love waifu #121 - Steamy Bathroom Encounter
description: Trapped in the steamy bathroom, her damp body presses against the cold tiles. The towel barely clings to her curves, teasing the softness beneath. Her breath quickens as she glances back—brown eyes dark with a mix of hesitation and desire. The mirror fogs up, but the tension between you is crystal clear.

attributes.value: The "Love Waifu" collection is a series of unique digital artworks featuring anime-style female characters in diverse emotional states and situations. Each NFT heroine isn't just a character — she's a moment suspended between temptation, vulnerability, and playful power. Enter a world where a single look can say more than any line of dialogue.
